title: Hour 2 - Roy Williams (04-30-20)
itunes:title: Hour 2 - Roy Williams (04-30-20)
description:
Roy Williams talks about what it was like to recruit big named college recruits including when he recruited Michael Jordan. Roy tells Dan about the play that was designed to go to James Worthy in the National Championship game where Michael Jordan hit the game winning shot.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
